hyperspace.title: Hyperspace
hyperspace.description: Hyperspace is a sleek and modern responsive web template designed for creative professionals, agencies, and businesses. Featuring a futuristic purple-toned design, it provides a visually engaging experience with smooth navigation and a well-structured layout.
features: Fully Responsive: Optimized for all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.
Minimalist Sidebar Navigation: A left-side menu with clean typography for seamless user interaction.
Hero Section: A bold introductory section with a prominent heading, subheading, and a call-to-action button.
Thumbnail Previews: A carousel-like section showcasing different sections of the website.

dimension.title: Dimension
dimension.description: 'Dimension' is a visually striking, fully responsive website template designed for showcasing portfolios, personal projects, or small businesses. It features a clean, minimalistic design with a full-screen background image, elegant typography, and subtle animations.
features: Fully Responsive: Optimized for all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.
Full-Screen Background: The template uses a high-resolution, full-screen background image to create a bold first impression.
Interactive Navigation Buttons: Four outlined buttons labeled Intro, Work, About, Contact provide quick access to different sections.
Seamless Scrolling: A carousel-like page structure showcasing different sections of the website.

feare.title: Feare
feare.description: This is the third template description.
